mapper.sql: wiao.asn_order_id, wiao.source_order_id, wiao.material_owner_id, wiao.supplier_id, wiao.order_type_id, wiao.asn_code, wiao.customer_order_code, wiao.related_order_code_1, wiao.related_order_code_2, wiao.related_order_code_3, wiao.order_date, wiao.plan_ago_date, wiao.start_receiving_date, wiao.end_receiving_date, wiao.shipper_name, wiao.link_man_name, wiao.link_man_phone, wiao.fax_number, wiao.e_mail_address, wiao.detailed_address, wiao.descr, wiao.order_status, wiao.status, wiao.remark, wiao.org_id, wiao.create_user_id, wiao.create_time, wiao.modified_user_id, wiao.modified_time, wiao.is_delete
mapper.select:
select ,
oto.transfer_order_code as source_order_code,
osro.sales_return_order_code as source_order_code,
oio.other_in_order_code as source_order_code,
ouo.other_out_order_id as source_order_code,
bw.warehouse_name,bws.storage_code, (select SUM(wiaod.packing_qty) FROM wms_in_asn_order_det wiaod where wiaod.asn_order_id=wiao.asn_order_id) as packing_qty, (select SUM(wiaod.actual_qty) FROM wms_in_asn_order_det wiaod where wiaod.asn_order_id=wiao.asn_order_id) as actual_qty, (select SUM(wiaod.putaway_qty) FROM wms_in_asn_order_det wiaod where wiaod.asn_order_id=wiao.asn_order_id) as putaway_qty, material_owner_name,bs.supplier_name,boy.order_type_name,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name AS organization_Name FROM wms_in_asn_order wiao
LEFT JOIN om_transfer_order oto ON oto.transfer_order_id = wiao.source_order_id
LEFT JOIN om_sales_return_order osro ON osro.sales_return_order_id = wiao.source_order_id
LEFT JOIN om_other_in_order oio ON oio.other_in_order_id = wiao.source_order_id
LEFT JOIN om_other_out_order ouo ON ouo.other_out_order_id = wiao.source_order_id
left join base_material_owner bmo ON wiao.material_owner_id=bmo.material_owner_id LEFT JOIN base_warehouse bw ON wiao.warehouse_id = bw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN base_storage bws ON wiao.storage_id = bws.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_supplier bs ON bs.supplier_id=wiao.supplier_id LEFT join base_order_type boy on wiao.order_type_id = boy.order_type_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON wiao.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON wiao.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON wiao.org_id = bo.organization_id
and wiao.asn_order_id = #{asnOrderId}
and wiao.asn_code like CONCAT('%',#{asnCode},'%')
and bmo.material_owner_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialOwnerName},'%')
and date_format(wiao.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and wiao.org_id = #{orgId}
and wiao.order_type_id = #{orderTypeId}
and wiao.order_status
#{item}
and boy.order_type_name = #{orderTypeName}
order by wiao.create_time desc
select barcode FROM mes_sfc_work_order_barcode WHERE work_order_barcode_id=#{id}
